We conduct clinicopathologic study elucidate correlation angiogenesis 18F-FMT 18F-FDG uptake patient non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . VEGF , CD31 , CD34 , LAT1 Ki-67 label index resect tumor analyze immunohistochemical staining , correlate clinicopathologic variable uptake PET tracer .
